sde.heading: First year
sde.details: Get good hands on !! experience with !! coding in COL100

sde.heading: Second year
sde.details: Regardless of taking COL106, familiarize !! yourself with data structures and !! algorithms in any language you prefer

sde.heading: Second year
sde.details: Seek coding-related projects with  !! professors; interdisciplinary work is a !! plus

sde.heading: Second year
sde.details: Complete intermediate-level DSA !! questions by the end of 4th semester

sde.heading: Summer break before 3rd year
sde.details: Use pre-internship summer to tackle !! hard DSA questions and study OS, !! DBMS, and other theories.

sde.heading: A month before interviews
sde.details: Tests begins for different companies after !! CV shortlist (if any) May have some !! aptitude questions

sde.heading: Interview
sde.details: Interviews focus on DSA; answer !! expected starting from brute force to !! optimal solutions.

quant.heading: Throughout the Journey
quant.details: Maintain a high CGPA and regularly give!! contest on codeforces

quant.heading: Post 3rd Sem
quant.details: Build your CV, Do projects in areas you like, find an !! internship/project for the summer, !! Participate in tech competitions to build schols

quant.heading: Post 4th sem
quant.details: Follow the resources mentioned for brainteasers, !! probability and programming problems

quant.heading: 1 month before interviews
quant.details: Begin company-specific test !! preparation in shortlisted companies

quant.heading: 2 weeks before interviews
quant.details: HR prep, Mock interviews, !! Market Making

core.heading: Prior to 4th Sem
core.details: Boost CG as much as possible !! !!

core.heading: Post 4th Sem
core.details: Corporate or research intern, !! preferably in the manufacturing !! sector

core.heading: 4th Sem
core.details: Take up project work either included !! in course, or led by a professor

core.heading: Prior to Day 1
core.details: Revisit your journey from childhood to IIT, your !! hobbies and any life changing events (these get !! asked a lot in interviews). Also revisit !! coursework and attempt mock aptitude tests

finance.details: Start by identifying the !! exact profile of analytics you !! want to target !! e.g Finance, Data etc

finance.heading: 3rd Sem
finance.details: Start coding and reach an optimum !! level till your winter break

finance.heading: 4th Sem
finance.details: Develop niche knowledge about !! SQL and DBMS in totality
Continue with project lookouts and  !! gather the projects as mentioned in !! the written guide

finance.heading: Post 4th Sem
finance.details: Learn from your projects and !! practice the resources given in the !! written guide

consult.details: Start shaping your CV convey !! the story you want! !! Look to achieve ‘spikes’.

consult.heading: Post 3rd Sem
consult.details: Complete internship/project to boost CV. !! Start reaching out for one timely

consult.heading: Post 4th Sem
consult.details: Completcorporate/startup/ !! foreign internships. !! Start reaching out during 4th Sem

consult.heading: 1–2 months before interviews
consult.details: Form case group and start !! practicing cases

consult.heading: Shortly after shortlists
consult.details: Buddies are assigned; !! buddy cases begin
